QuestData.Title: A Steady Supply
QuestData.Description: Hey bud. Seeing as how you're so friendly and great and all, think you might do a dwarf a favor?$B$BThese are Dunwald ruins... there's SURE to be more stock in some of these buildings. If you come upon more ale, bring it my way, will ya? A good dwarf can never have enough!$B$BI'm thinkin' I'll find my way back to Keely, so ya might have to hunt me down, but I'll try'n make it worth it to ya.
QuestData.RewardText: Woooooh! That's exactly what my belly needs!$B$BYou get me all the nice things.
